mapper.select: select FLOOR(sum(r.restar)/count(*)) AS SUMSTAR, count(*) CNT from review r inner join reservation re on r.rid=re.rid inner join room_info ri on re.riid=ri.riid where ri.aid=#{AID}
select count(*) CNT from review r inner join reservation re on r.rid=re.rid inner join room_info ri on re.riid=ri.riid where ri.aid=#{AID}
